Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards highlighted a 32-point performance with seven 3-pointers.
Zion Williamson returned from a 27-game absence and had 22 points, six rebounds, four assists, three steals, and a block in 27 minutes.
Former Pelican Julius Randle scored 16 points and ex-LSU star Naz Reid had 13 points and 12 rebounds for Minnesota.
Rudy Gobert had 14 rebounds and six blocks.
Dejounte Murray scored 29 points for New Orleans.
CJ McCollum, who scored 50 points just two games earlier, shot 1-of-14.
Donte DiVincenzo started at point guard for a second straight night in place of Mike Conley.
Edwards hit a free throw and a pair of 3s during a 19-2, third-quarter run that helped Minnesota turn a 64-57 deficit into a 75-66 lead in less than four minutes.
